title: Garden Magic
author: Architect Abby
pages: A garden isnâ€™t just greenery; it's your personal oasis! Frame the environment with rich hedges and vibrant blooms.
Utilize different flower varieties like lilacs and peonies for height variance. Their pops of color can really stand out.
Bushes and leaves provide texture; mix in garden paths with gravel or cobblestone for walkability and charm.
Consider adding small water features like fountains or ponds, bringing tranquility and life to your open-air sanctuaries.
